text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Culver City, California | official_name = | settlement_type = City | native_name = | named_for = Harry Culver | image_skyline = CulverHotelday.jpg | image_caption = Culver Hotel | image_flag = Flag of Culver City, California.png | flag_size = | image_seal = Seal of Culver City, California.png | nickname = | motto = "The Heart of Screenland" | image_map = File:LA County Incorporated Areas Culver City highlighted.svg | mapsize = 250x200px | map_caption = Location within Los Angeles County | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = State | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = County | subdivision_name2 = Los Angeles | established_title = Incorporated | established_date = September 20, 1917 | government_type = | leader_title = | leader_name = | leader_title1 = | leader_name1 = | leader_title2 = | leader_name2 = | leader_title3 = | leader_name3 = | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_sq_mi = 5.14 | area_total_km2 = 13.31 | area_land_sq_mi = 5.11 | area_land_km2 = 13.24 | area_water_sq_mi = 0.03 | area_water_km2 = 0.07 | area_water_percent = | area_metro_sq_mi = | area_metro_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_ft = 95 | elevation_m = 29 | population_as_of = 2020 | population_footnotes = | population_total = 40779 | pop_est_as_of = | pop_est_footnotes = | population_est = | population_density_sq_mi = 7977 | population_density_km2 = 3080 | population_metro = | population_density_metro_sq_mi = | population_density_metro_km2 = | timezone = Pacific Time Zone | utc_offset = −8 | timezone_DST = PDT | utc_offset_DST = −7 | postal_code_type = ZIP Codes | postal_code = 90230–90232, 90066 | area_code_type = Area codes | area_code = 310/424 | blank_name = FIPS code | blank_info = | blank1_name = GNIS feature IDs | blank1_info = , | website = }} Culver City is a city in western Los Angeles County, California. It is known for being the headquarters of NPR West and Sony Pictures and was at one time home to studios for NFL Network. == References ==
